colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI NI PHYOGS BCUR BZHUGS PA'I BLA MA YI DAM LHA SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS MKHA' 'GRO CHOS BSRUNG TSOGS BCAS DANG, KHYAD PAR DZAMBHA LA SER NAG DKA' LJANG HA MO NOR RGYUN MA RGYAL CHEN RNAM THOS SRAS SOGS DANG, RTA BDAG BRGYAD DANG KU BEE RE NOR LHA A'ARYA RE MANTA P'A RA P'ARN'A SHA WA RI BI TZI GUNTA LI DANG PANYDZA LI KA GA-YANG LHA BCAS RNAMS DANG, LHA KLU GZA' SKAR SA BDAG YUL LHA ME LHA'I THAB LHA SPUN DGU 'DI RNAMS BSANGS MCHOD ZHES BYA BA PHAN YON NI THAMS CAD PHAN BDE STZOL, ,BSOD NAMS MED 'GRO BA RNAMS BSOD NAMS 'PHEL, NOR MED 'GRO BA NOR RGYUN 'PHEL, ,ZAS GOS MED 'GRO BA LA ZAS GOS 'PHEL 'GYUR RO, PHYUGS BZHI MED PHYUGS BZHE GA-YANG 'PHEL 'GYUR RO, ,GA-YANG STON @005A *, ,NAS BSOD NAMS 'BOD PA'I DUS 'DI BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL 'TAB PAS, ME NOR PHYUGS LA GOD KHA SBYANG SHOR JAG RKUN YAMS NAD RIMS NAD DANG GNOD PA PHO MO'I PHUNG SRI GNOD BYED 'GONG THE'U RANG BYUNG PO MI DANG MI MA YIN GYIS GNOD PA KHYAD PAR MI NOR PHYUGS LA GOD KHA MI 'GYUR RO, MTHUN RKYEN TSE DANG BSOD NAMS DPAL 'BYOR ZAS DKAR 'O MA ZHO DANG CHANG SOGS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO, ,DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN DU AARTHA SID DHI MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SBYOR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, SHIN TU 'GRO RNAMS KYIS GSANG BAR BYA'O, ZAB RGYA: aiTHI: 'DI BSANGS MI RGYAS SMRAS DUS LA DAM TSIG KHAS LEN DANG DAM TSIG BSAM SDUS LA MI SMRAS BYA'O, ,ZAB BSANG BA MAN NGAG BSANGS MI RGYAL TE, ,DGE'O, MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,)
